member.name: M:OnTop.frmMain.IsTopMost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determina se a janela passada está com o atributo TopMost setado

member.name: P:OnTop.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
